comments.text: This Roundabout can be reached from Torshavn with free public busses (the red one are free currently, might change). Just stand at the exit where you want to go. I hitchhiked to Vágar, Torshavn and Eysturoy from here. Really easy.
If you visited beautiful Saksun, this will be the best place to hitchhike back to civilisation. But take care, as there will be not so much traffic. Enjoy the stunning landscape!

This is the easiest spot if you want to hitchhike out of the city, for all directions it is awesome! From 2022 you can even thumb into and cross the new 11 km long tunnel to Eysturoy! :] Faroe Islands are the best of the bests!

This is one of the MOST AWESOME hitchhiking spots ever, not only because it is right next to a tunnel entrance, but because while you are waiting for your ride, you can see the magical Faroese landscape! :]
RIght before the tunnel is perfect to stand, as you can see your upcoming ride from a relaxed distance! :]  [ AdrianB ]
